thread.title: Meryl Streep Gets Support From Daughter Grace Gummer At 'Suffragette' Premiere!
thread.title_full: Meryl Streep Gets Support From Daughter Grace Gummer At 'Suffragette' Premiere! - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Meryl Streep Gets Support From Daughter Grace Gummer At 'Suffragette' Premiere!
text: Meryl Streep is all smiles as she poses with her daughter Grace Gummer while attending the premiere of her latest film Suffragette at the Samuel Goldwyn Theater on Tuesday (October 20) in Beverly Hills, Calif. The 66-year-old actress was also joined on the red carpet by her co-star Carey Mulligan, as well as Sharon Osbourne, [...] Â»
